ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Ministry of Health of Republic of North Macedonia

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Ministry of Health of Republic of North Macedonia

TITLE.P: Procurement of 7 Ambulance (EMS) Vehicles for Health Center Skopje

SHORT_DESCR.P: Procurement of 7 ambulance (EMS) vehicles for Health Center Skopje.
Procurement of 7 ambulance (EMS) vehicles for Health Center Skopje.

SUITABILITY.P: In order to establish their capacity for performance of professional duty, economic operators should submit a document for registered business as evidence that they are registered as physical or legal entities for performance of activities related to the subject of the public procurement contract or evidence that they as operators belong to an adequate professional association, in accordance with the regulations of the country where the operator is registered.

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_INFO.P: — declare statement for having employed or engaged expert team of minimum 3 (three) workers responsible for service and maintenance of vehicles during the contract implementation, out of which 2 (two) machine technicians for vehicles and 1 (one) electro-technician,

— declare statement for having possession of personal or rented agreement for business cooperation for free of charged tow service in case of vehicle defects or traffic accident on the territory of R. Macedonia and Europe (as continent) for minimum of 5 (five) years period of time

TECHNICAL_PROFESSIONAL_MIN_LEVEL.P: — has employed or engaged expert team of minimum 3 (three) workers responsible for service and maintenance of vehicles during the contract implementation, out of which 2 (two) machine technicians for vehicles and 1 (one) electro-technician,

— is in possession of personal or rented agreement for business cooperation for free of charged tow service in case of vehicle defects or traffic accident on the territory of R. Macedonia and Europe (as continent) for minimum of 5 (five) years period of time.

ADDRESS_REVIEW_INFO.OFFICIALNAME: Ministry of Health of Republic of North Macedonia
